actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to allow the President to appoint an individual to serve on the Federal Reserve Board whom he intends to designate as chairman who is from the same Federal Reserve district as a current member of the Board.
short_title: Federal Reserve Board Selection Reform Act

summary.text: Federal Reserve Board Selection Reform Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to allow the President to appoint an individual to serve on the Federal Reserve Board of Governors whom he intends to designate as chairman and who is from the same Federal Reserve district as a current member of such Board.

titles.title: Federal Reserve Board Selection Reform Act

A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to allow the President to appoint an individual to serve on the Federal Reserve Board whom he intends to designate as chairman who is from the same Federal Reserve district as a current member of the Board.
